result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Nicholas J Rakotz

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Nicholas J Rakotz in court with attorney John Gerard Hinde.  Defendant Nicholas J Rakotz in custody.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. THIS COVERS 15CM238, 15CM189, 15CM137, 15CM108 AND 15CM107. Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights presented and discussed. VIS filed.

15CM238: Defendant pleads guilty to Counts 1 and 2. Counts 3, 4, 5 and 6 - DRI.
15CM189: Defendant pleads guilty to Counts 1. Counts 2 and 3 - DRI.
15CM107, 15CM108 and 15CM137 - DRI.

15CM107 & 15CM108 - State requests bond be held in order to be applied towards restitution. Court orders bond forfeited but held for restitution.

State makes recommendation. Defense makes recommendation. Defendant makes statement.

15CM238: 
Count 1 - 60 days jail with Huber and Good Time. Consecutive to 15CM189 - credit for 41 days
Count 2 - 60 days jail with Huber and Good Time granted. Consecutive to Count 1 and 15CM189.
Court costs.

15CM189: 60 days jail with Huber and Good Time. Credit for 45 days jail. Court costs.
  
15CM238: Restitution in the amount of $219.63 with payment to the Veteran's Affairs first and then Walmart.
$100.00 cash bond from 15CM107 to be applied towards restitution in 15CM238 first. 

State files C-31.

(clerked by AP)
Defendant Nicholas J Rakotz in court with attorney John Gerard Hinde.  Defendant Nicholas J Rakotz in custody.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

THIS COURT RECORD COVERS 15CM238, 15CM108, 15CM107, 15CM137 AND 15CM189

15CM238 (INIT):  
Defendant pleads NG.
Bond set in 15CM238

15CM108, 15CM107, 15CM137 AND 15CM189 to track with 15CM238

Defendant Nicholas J Rakotz in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Defendant Nicholas J Rakotz in custody.  Russell Edward Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
COVERS 15CM189, 15CM107, 15CM108,15CM137.

15CM189: Waives reading - enters not guilty pleas.

15CM107, 15CM108, 15CM137:  State requests amended bond modification for each of these cases be modified back to NO CONTACT with Harriet B. instead of no abusive contact with Harriet Blake.  Court grants amendment in all cases.
  Plea hearing scheduled for June 15, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
of Completion of No Contact Class

15CM137, 15CM108 and 15CM107 to be set to 6/15/15 at 2:00 PM.  Plea hearing scheduled for June 15, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
